quote: We’ll have to go back there one day, the both of us. You can show my all your favorite places.”“Silly man,” I laughed and pulled his face down to mine. “You are my favorite place.
quote_letters: WELL HAVE TO GO BACK THERE ONE DAY THE BOTH OF US YOU CAN SHOW MY ALL YOUR FAVORITE PLACESSILLY MAN I LAUGHED AND PULLED HIS FACE DOWN TO MINE YOU ARE MY FAVORITE PLACE
